context:
Solving my biggest anxiety - preventing secrets from leaking into production

```python
from sklearn.ensemble import IsolationForest
import numpy as np

detector = IsolationForest(contamination=0.1, random_state=42)
telemetry_data = np.array([[0.5, 0.3, 0.8], [0.1, 0.9, 0.2]])
anomaly_scores = detector.fit_predict(telemetry_data)
```

Born from curiosity about what makes systems truly secure.
